description:
The DuraBlade advanced Trim/Shave Technology is the long-lasting solution for trimming, shaping, and edging facial hair. This all-in-one product cuts and trims any length of hair, so you can groom from a full beard to close stubble in one easy step. The unique dual-sided trimming head shaves at this comfortable stubble length—not too close to skin—to help prevent nicks and cuts. You also get four guide combs for trimming at different lengths for your beard and stubble.

With DuraBlade, you’ll save time and money because you don’t have to worry about replacing the blades. DuraBlade stays sharp for a consistent trimming experience that you can depend on.

*Blades are designed to remain sharp for 5-year product life.

Product Essentials
Remington® DuraBlade Lithium – Trim, Shape, Shave
DuraBlade does it all. TST Ultra tackles any length of hair, from full beard to close stubble in one quick step. It’s perfect for guys with beards, goatees, stubble, and for those who like to change it up. Plus, the comfort-tip blades don’t get too close to skin, helping to prevent nicks and cuts.

Never Replace Blades*
No more dull blades. No more buying replacements. DuraBlade is engineered to deliver consistent trimming performance, with clip-on guide combs for custom styles.

What Can This Groomer Do?
Trim, shape, and shave any facial hair style.

Features:

Never Replace Blades*
DuraBlade is built to last. The advanced trimming head is engineered to be a long-term grooming solution, staying sharp* and saving you from buying replacement blades.

Trim
Keep your look in check. The four clip-on guide combs (1-6mm) give you length options for trimming your beard or stubble.

Shape
Find your style. Use the edge of the dual-sided trimming blade to shape your beard or goatee.

Shave
A comfortable close stubble shave is easy with DuraBlade. The comfort-tip blades don’t get too close to skin, helping to prevent nicks and cuts.

100% Waterproof
Find your most comfortable shaving experience. The waterproof design is shower-safe. Plus, cleanup is a breeze.

Lithium Battery
The rechargeable lithium battery delivers maximum power to the blades for consistent, high performance. A full charge provides up to 60 minutes of cordless runtime.

Built To Last
DuraBlade is backed by a five-year limited warranty.

Hardware
Check out the features and accessories engineered to deliver grooming success.

Flexing Head
The dual-sided trimming head adjusts to the contours of your face and facial hair for comfort and performance.

USB Charging Cable
Use any USB charging source to recharge the dependable Lithium battery.

Trim/Shave Technology
TST Ultra Tech lets you trim any length of facial hair and shave to a comfortable 5’oclock shadow, giving you the power to create your signature look.

Guide Combs
Four clip-on combs make it easy to craft any look for your beard and stubble. Sizes include: 1mm, 2mm, 4mm, 6mm.

description:
Designed for use with Philips Norelco Shavers 6100, 6500 and 66000 (formerly SensoTouch 2D electric shavers). The Philips Norelco RQ11 Replacement Shaving Head provides a comfortable electric shave. It uses GyroFlex 2D technology to offer a superior shaving experience. The Super Lift and Cut dual-blade action lifts hair to cut comfortably close below skin level, while the DualPrecision system includes slots and holes to effectively remove both long hair and short stubble.

GyroFlex 2D Technology for Comfort and Performance
Designed to follow the contours of your face, the RQ11  shaving head utilizes GyroFlex 2D, two-dimensional technology that allows the razors to pivot in a circular motion and tilt inwards. Its system adjusts easily to every curve, minimizing both pressure and irritation. The result is a close shave that's easy on your skin.

Comfortably Shaves Wet or Dry
Shaver 6100 heads let you shave any way you want. The Aquatec seal gives you the option of either a comfortable dry shave or a refreshing wet shave with shaving cream or gel.

 

Cuts Long Hairs and Short Stubble
The DualPrecision shaving system is designed to effectively shave both longer hairs and short stubble for precise results and a smooth finish. Flexing heads stay in close contact with your skin, while the pivoting neck adds an extra dimension of movement--all giving you a close, fast and comfortable shave.

 

Super Lift and Cut Technology Provides a Close Shave
The replacement shaving head is equipped with the patented Super Lift and Cut System which is designed to give you a close and comfortable shave as the first blade lifts while the second blade cuts comfortably below skin level.

 

Low Friction SkinGlide Surface for an Extra Smooth Shave
The low-friction SkinGlide shaving surface slides smoothly along your skin for a close, easy shave.
title: Philips Norelco SensoTouch 2D Replacement Head - RQ11/52

description: Men's Cordless Electric Body Trimmer with Three AttachmentsER-GK60-SER-GK60-S Men's Cordless Electric Full Body Trimmer This slim, easy-to-use wet dry trimmer for men makes personal grooming gentle and easy. A smart V-shaped trimmer head smoothly maneuvers in any direction, and a precision fixed and motor-driven blade system trims comfortably on every area of the body.FeaturesGentle TrimmingPanasonic's wide-edge, skin-protective blade system ensures gentle trimming comfort and the optimum results for body grooming. The precision ER-GK60-S blades efficiently capture and cut unwanted body hair while also protecting the skin from irritation. Unique, Ultra-thin Trimmer Blades The edges of the fixed blade are wide and rounded, to effectively capture and cut body hair while reducing stimulation on the skin. Gaps on the fixed blade are also narrow and closely spaced to help prevent pulling and tugging on skin and hair. And, with a thickness of just .1mm, the ER-GK60-S allows you to trim closely to the skin, for an extremely clean, smooth feel. Easy to Use The slim, easy-to-hold and easy-to-use design makes personal grooming easier and more precise. Both the trimmer's sleek profile and sure-grip handle let you maneuver and control trimming in any direction with just your fingertips. V-Shape Trimmer HeadThe unique, V-shaped trimmer head makes clean, comfortable grooming easy, especially in hard-to-reach areas like the armpits, glutes and groin. Soft Touch Trimming With a powerful motor drive, the V-shape trimmer head vibrates quietly at high velocity to provide gentle, effortless shaving, trimming and detailing- fast. 3 Precision AttachmentsThe ER-GK60 includes three attachments to make full body trimming easier, and more precise. The trimmer's waterproof design makes it safe and simple to groom in the shower with or without your favorite foam or gel. This versatile trimmer can also be used on dry skin for comfortable grooming anytime, anywhere you want.Cleans in Seconds Cleaning and maintaining your trimmer is quick and easy. Simply hold the trimmer head under warm running water for convenient cleaning in seconds.Stylish Charging Stand This sleek, cordless trimmer comes complete with an AC charging stand to deliver a full charge overnight (eight hours) for 40 minutes of trimming and grooming power. description: Panasonic Arc5 Electric Razor, Men's 5-Blade Cordless with Shave Sensor Technology and Wet/Dry Convenience, ES-LV65-SES-LV65-S Arc5 5-Blade Shaving SystemEnjoy closer, more comfortable shaving with this premium men's electric shaver. It includes five precision-honed, ultra-sharp, hypoallergenic Nanotech blades, powered by a high-efficiency 14,000 cpm linear-drive motor. An Arc 5 Multi-Flex, quick-pivoting shaving head traces facial contours and an active shaving sensor detects different beard densities as you shave to adjust cutting power where needed for smoother results.The Ultimate in Closeness and Comfort The premium Arc5 mens electric razor system provides the ultimate in closeness and comfort with five ultra-sharp, ultra-thin Nanotech blades. Arc 5 inner blades are forged and honed to an acute 30° cutting edge to cut more cleanly and efficiently at the root for the ultimate in cleaner, more efficient and comfortable shaving. Active Shaving SensorAdvanced, built-in Arc5 sensors automatically detect varying differences in beard density along the cheeks, neck and jaw. As the electric razor moves across your face, power flow is continually adjusted to accelerate where beard is thickest, and soften where it's not.Premium Grooming PerformanceThe premium Arc5 system makes it easy to comfortably shave the hard-to-reach areas of your face. The agile Multi-Flex pivoting head and Multi-Fit outer foil effortlessly glide, flex and pivot along the contours of the face, jaw, chin and neck to shave from any direction. A built-in precision trimmer with a fine, 45° angled blade gives mustaches and sideburns the perfect finish and detail. Flexible Micro-Thin FoilsThree micro-thin Arc 5 foils cleanly capture, hold and cut the different types of hair that make up the beard. And, the slight arc of the foils allow them to keep in close contact with the skin, for quick, clean shaving. 14,000 CPM Hyper Performance Linear MotorA smooth, clean shave is also fast with a quiet, high-performance Arc5 linear motor designed to shave at speeds of 14,000 cycles per minute (cpm), and ensure peak performance from beginning to end of every battery charge. Compared with 10,000 cpm shavers, the Arc5 operates nearly 1.5 times faster, with twice the cutting force. Wet/Dry ConvenienceWhether you're in a hurry or have time to spare, the premium wet dry Arc5 is ready when you are. Use the Arc 5 for a quick, dry shave when short on time or when time permits. Shave over the sink or in the shower with your favorite shaving foam or gel. 100% WashableThis powerful shaver is also a breeze to clean. Simply hold it under hold warm, running water to quickly rinse away hair stubble and gel or foam residue.Ideal for TravelThe ES-LV65-S shaver is designed with universal voltage for comfortable shaving while travelling. It also includes an AC adaptor, travel safety lock and travel pouch.

description: Legendary Craftsmanship.A Tradition of Innovation. Advancing the Japanese art of crafting exceptionally sharp and durable swords, Panasonic has applied state-of-the art blade technology to the Panasonic Arc3 Series shavers.The result is precision blades of extraordinary strength and performance. And the edge you need for an extremely close, comfortable shave. Advanced 3-Blade ARC Shaving SystemSpecially designed by Panasonic, the powerful ARC3 3-blade system combines pure shaving velocity with multi-blade precision to cut through facial hair gently and comfortably for incredibly close results. The system's ultra-thin Nanotech blades are forged from premium stainless steel. And each is precisely honed to a 30° angle for optimal sharpness to cut whiskers at the root for fast, smooth, efficient shaving. 13,000 CPM Linear Motor DriveDriven by a quiet, high-speed linear motor, the ARC3 delivers the evenly distributed power you need for fast, effective shaving. And as battery power is used, this high-performance motor maintains continuous peak performance to the end of every battery charge.Ultra-Thin ARC Foil SystemThree contoured, micro-thin hypoallergenic foils instantly capture, hold and cut the different types of hair that make up the beard for outstanding closeness and comfort. The distinctly patterned Lift-Tech Foil applies reverse-tapered edges to gently raise and cut hairs that lie flat. The Slit Blade Foil grabs and cuts longer hairs that often grow in opposite directions. And, the Finishing Foil captures stubborn, extra-thick hair to ensure smooth, even results. Shave Sensor TechnologyAdvanced built-in sensors automatically "feel"differences in beard density along the cheeks, jaw and neck. As the ARC3 shaver moves across the face, power flow is continually adjusted to accelerate where the beard is thickest, and soften where it's not.3D Multi-Flex Pivoting HeadAs you shave, an advanced 3D Multi-Flex Pivoting Head glides seamlessly - up and down, side-to-side and back-and-forth - to trace the individual contours of your face, neck and jaw for the ultimate in close, gentle comfort. Precision Pop-Up TrimmerAfter shaving, add the perfect finish with an ultra-sharp 45° blade pop-up trimmer. Ideal for precision detailing of sideburns and mustaches.Shave Close and Conveniently Dry or in the ShowerWhen you're in a hurry, the wet/dry ARC3 delivers a quick, smooth dry shave. And, because it's 100% washable and fully immersible in water, it also performs as efficiently in the shower as it does over the sink using your favorite foam or gel.Natural, Sure-Grip Design for Total ControlDesigned to fit comfortably in either hand, the ergonomic, soft-touch rubber grip ensures total shaving control, even when used in the shower.Check Shaver Status at a GlanceThe easy-to-read, multi-function LED in the handle makes it quick and simple to check shaver functions like battery power level, recharging status, travel lock on/off and more. Men's Shaver Replacement Blades and FoilsTo help maintain the level of grooming comfort and satisfaction you demand from your shaver, the high-performance blades and foils should be replaced with genuine, easy-to-install Panasonic replacements blades and foils.

description:
Panasonic ARC 3 Electric Razor, Men's 3-Blade Cordless with Wet Dry Convenience, ES-RT17-K
Features

Legendary Craftsmanship. A Tradition of Innovation.
Advancing the Japanese art of crafting exceptionally sharp and durable swords, Panasonic applies state-of-the art blade technology to the Panasonic ARC 3 Series shavers. The result is precision blades of extraordinary strength and performance.
And the edge you need for an extremely close, comfortable shave.

Advanced ARC Shaving System
Shave quickly and closely through all beard types and densities with three floating, ultra-thin stainless-steel inner blades. Each is precision honed to a 30° angle to cut whiskers cleanly at the base for smoother, more efficient shaving. And all are hypoallergenic for safe, irritation-free shaving on sensitive skin.

30° Nano Polished Blades
The ultra-sharp, 30° cutting edge of ARC 3 blades provides an incredibly close shave. Driven by a high-power motor drive, the blades cut cleanly and comfortably through even the toughest beards.

Ultra-Thin ARC Foil System
As you shave, three hypoallergenic ARC foils work simultaneously to provide close, clean and even results. These super-smooth, ultra-flexible foils capture, hold and cut many hair types and densities. An accompanying quick-comb blade catches and cuts longer hairs.
 
High-Velocity Motor
The high-speed ARC 3 inner-blade system in the Panasonic shaver is driven by a powerful, durable 10,000 rpm motor for fast, streamlined shaving.

Flexible, Quick-Pivot Head
A highly flexible shaver head glides effortlessly over face, chin and neck, flexing up-and-down and side-to-side for faster, more comfortable and efficient shaving.

Wet Dry Convenience
When you're on the go or need a quick touch-up, the ES-RT17 ARC 3 Men's Shaver provides a smooth dry shave. And, because it's also designed for full immersion in water, it performs just as efficiently in the shower or at the sink with shaving foam or gel. The shaver is 100% washable and rinses cleans in seconds under warm, running water.

Don't Forget the Details
When shaving is done, a simple slide of the finger instantly engages a super-sharp, 45° blade trimmer to add the perfect details to sideburns, beards and mustaches, plus deal instantly with stray, unwanted hairs.

Masculine Design with Rubberized Grip
The shaver's sleek, lightweight blue and silver body has an ergonomic, rubberized grip for maximum comfort and control in either hand and optimum shaving and trimming results.

Durable, Rechargeable Battery
A high-performance Ni-MH battery charges in an hour to provide up to 21 minutes of continuous, cordless power. An ARC 3 shaver holder is included for storage and travel.

ARC 3 Replacement Blades and Foils
To help maintain the level of grooming comfort and satisfaction you demand from your Panasonic electric razor, blades and foils should be replaced once every one to two years* with genuine, easy-to-install Panasonic replacements blades and foils.

*Suggested blades and foil replacement based on once daily usage of 3 minutes. Replacement schedule varies based on individual hair type/density and usage.
title: Panasonic ARC 3-Blade Shaver ES-RT17-K

description:
Philips Norelco HQ9/52 Replacement Heads fit the following shaver models: AT900 series, 8100 series, 8200 series, 9100 series. To replace the heads:
1) Switch off the shaver and disconnect it from the power outlet.
2) Press the release button to open the shaving unit.
3) Turn the lock anticlockwise and remove the retaining frame.
4) Remove the shaving heads and place new ones in the shaving unit.
5) Make sure that the projections of the shaving heads fit exactly into the recesses.
6) Put the retaining frame back into the shaving unit and turn the lock clockwise.
7) Close the shaving unit until you hear a click.

Note: If the shaving unit does not close smoothly, check if you have inserted the shaving heads properly and if the retaining frame is locked.
title: Philips Norelco Replacement Head - HQ9/52

description:
Panasonic ER-SB40-K Men's Precision Power Beard, Mustache and Hair Trimmer with Linear Motor

ER-SB40-K Men's Precision Power Beard, Mustache and Hair Trimmer
Powerful, enhanced comfort trimmer cuts and details even unruly hair with a high-speed linear motor, ultra-sharp blade and 19-setting adjustable settings for exact, hair lengths. Easily use cordless at home or on the go, or plug in for longer use. Cleans quickly under warm, running water. AC adapter included.

Our Most Powerful Cutting System
From quick trims and touch-ups to precision shaping and styling, a high-powered CPM linear motor quickly and comfortably handles any type of facial and other hair. And even where hair density varies, this exceptional motor maintains a constant speed for smooth, even results.

Advanced Performance Blade
Honed to an optimal cutting edge, the trimmer's ultra-sharp blade cuts even difficult to capture hair, including whiskers that lay flat on the skin. And, this performance blade is made from hypoallergenic stainless steel to ensure minimal irritation.

Snap-on Attachment
An included comb attachment snaps instantly over the blade to cleanly and confidently trim, style and maintain beards and mustaches, as well as hair on the head and neck.

19 Hair Length Options
Create and maintain your style with the trimmer's quick-adjust dial. Smartly positioned on the trimmer handle for easy access, the dial instantly adjusts between 19 individual settings from 0.5mm to 10mm for personalized hair lengths you want. Cutting length without the snap-on attachment is approximately 0.5 mm.

Easy-Grip Control
Sleek, lightweight and durable, the ER-SB40 beard and hair trimmer has a rubberized, ergonomic handle for optimum comfort, total control, and precise cutting and trimming results.

Wash Clean in Seconds
A water drain in the trimmer head opens wide to let warm running water from your faucet flow freely through the blades for fast, simple cleaning.

Trim With or Without a Cord
Cut and trim cordlessly at home or on the go, or plug in any AC outlet for longer use. The durable, rechargeable Li-Ion battery provides up to 60 minutes of power with a one hour charge. A dual LED display in the handle shows 3-stage power and charge status.

Trimming While Travelling
For grooming away from home, the trimmer conveniently includes automatic universal voltage.
title: Panasonic Premium Adjustable Beard Trimmer ER-SB40-K

2) Press the release button to open the shaving unit. 3) Turn the lock anticlockwise and remove the retaining frame.
4) Remove the shaving heads and place new ones in the shaving unit.
5) Make sure that the projections of the shaving heads fit exactly into the recesses.
6) Put the retaining frame back into the shaving unit and turn the lock clockwise.
7) Close the shaving unit until you hear a click. Note: If the shaving unit does not close smoothly, check if you have inserted the shaving heads properly and if the retaining frame is locked. Note that the RQ32 contains 2 shaver heads.
